message: I just started watching back episodes and I'm in season/series 2 now.  Man, the British really know how to do silly humor.  I love this show!  Moss Roy and Jen are all hillarious.  I love how they react to totally absurd situations.  Why are there only 6 episodes in a season?
Well, at least there are 3 or 4 seasons to watch. I love Moss, he just makes me laugh so hard.
I've seen the first two seasons. The first one was ridiculously good, but I wasn't as much of a fan of the second.
One of my favourite TV shows. Graham Linehan (@glinner on Twitter) is a brilliant comedy writer.

I was somehow decieved by the suddent change of atmosphere between S1 and S2. I miss the indescriptible mess in their "office" and creepy hallway... Couches, brand new desks and flat screens, seriously ?
The guy who plays Moss (Richard Ayoade) directed last night's episode of Community.
It's a hilarious show, but it seems that the last season was a little too ridiculous.
Agreed. Top notch show but is jumping the shark. Needs to be culled.

@romain I was the same way. When I started watching the second season, for a split second I was wondering if I had managed to skip a season and went straight to a third since so much was suddenly different.
6 eps in a season is pretty standard for UK shows. Personally, I enjoyed the 1st & 2nd seasons, 3rd was strange but I warmed up to the 4th. Reeeeeeeally hope it doesn't jump the shark anytime soon
I just started watching it. A few episodes in and I am enjoying it. I'm happy I finally got the context behind the very long 999 number joke that is repeated on Fark.
The IT Crowd is amazing. One of the most enjoyable sit coms out there. Maurice Moss is just brilliant and the huge amount of randomness is awesome.
a show that good doesn't deserve it
they need to ditch the laugh track, though
When are the new episodes?  We NEED new episodes!

I want to agree about the laugh track, but that would require restructuring the show. It just never should have had one in the first place. Anyways, between the IT crowd and Garth Marenghi's darkplace, I think I can safely say Richard Ayoade and Matt Berry are my favorite British comedic actors.
Love IT crowd. Very funny. I haven't a favourite character as there all brilliant! Lol
Love the show :) bought the disc too :)
